item.title: e-Matrix Innovations GmbH
item.description:
I’m a proud employee and CIO of e-Matrix Innovations since 2019.

Hello!

We are e-Matrix Innovations.
We design and develop modern web solutions especially for Health&Safety instructions and visitor trainings as well as the e-learning medias necessary for these solutions and other topics like cyber security and GDPR.

Headquater

e-Matrix Innovations GmbH
Stelzhamer Strasse 9/1
4600 Wels, Austria

Workplace Safety and Visitor Instruction Systems

from Design to Go Live

Visit our web page at ➛ https://e-matrix.at

Protected content for e-Matrix staff

/ematrix - protected by user/password.
